text: I love this place. I love all of the shakes and teas. They have something for everyone!!!  They are amazing people with lots of personality and I always enjoy our morning talks 😁

resp.text: Thank you so much!!!!! We love our morning talks with our family!!! Sometimes it’s hard when we are busy but hope we always manage to find time to visit and keep everyone moving 🤗

name: Nicholas S Turner
text: Amazing staff! Great nutritional options for any and everyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much and so glad you enjoyed it!

name: Sydney Newton
text: I got a shake and it was not what I expected. There were a lot of “sweet” flavors for shakes (birthday cake, cookies and cream, banana cream pie, etc) but mine wasn’t what I had hoped for. It was my first time and maybe I just didn’t get the right flavor but I don’t know. The lady didn’t ask what size I wanted (I’m still not sure if there are different sizes) but I paid $7 for a giant drink that I ended up throwing away pretty quickly

name: Diane Banks
text: I love this place. The drinks are delicious and the staff is always friendly and fast

name: Tracey Bear
text: Yummy!!! We’re from out of town, but when we come to Montgomery we always stop in and get a healthy, awesome shake!! The staff are always wonderful and helpful and the tea selection is top notch, but there is nothing better than something something that is good for you and tastes great! The shakes here fit the bill 👍

name: Anna Coffin
text: Staff is always amazing! Cambrie is absolutely amazing. Literally the best teas in montgomery!

name: Kelton Smith
text: Nice enough place, but staff seemed to be enjoying their time in the shop by themselves and we busted that up by showing up. When asked if we knew what we wanted we were just pointed to the big board on the wall so the young ladies could go back to chatting. Never been in the place before and had no clue what to get so we guessed on one thing but they were out of it, and then just guessed at another, all of which I think were the teas. They were super pretty drinks, but looks deceived the rip out of us. One person's first reaction to taking a sip of their drink was to make a scrunched face and blurt "This tastes like a foot. Like a literal foot." and my drink was so sour and had this taste... The best way I can describe the taste is that of very out dated Flintstone chewable vitamins. Ended up not drinking any of the drinks we got. Probably won't go back to be honest, but if fate does land me there again I'd probably stick with the shakes that I see everyone going bonkers about and update this review at that time.

name: camryn cook
text: Got the birthday cake shake as a first timer and was not disappointed! For only $8, it was a steal!

name: Shania Brothers.
text: Super friendly! Love the motivational quotes they write on your cup and very helpful with what I needed to order for my super fruity and sweet taste buds !

name: Jade K
text: I love this place . This place has the best tasting shakes ever and they’re healthy. It gives me energy and is very filling.

name: terry brown
text: Nice young ladies. Not too sure about the tea...

resp.text:
Thank you for the review!
We need to get you sure about your tea.
See you soon to get your perfect tea!

name: Keyera Chardonnay
text: First time going today with my sister. We loved the atmosphere, great friendly helpful staff. We highly recommend.

name: Susan Faw
text: Very helpful staff. Tea's are a great pick me up in the middle of the day.

resp.text: Thank you so very much! We appreciate you.

name: Kia Wilson
text: Today I tried a Turtle shake and a BlowPop tea from The Healthy Frogg.  I enjoyed both.  I was expecting a little more caramel taste in the turtle but it wasn't bad.  I would try the BlowPop tea again.  Will return.  Nice healthy alternative!

name: Nicole Gates
text: Super friendly staff, beautiful location, and amazing products. Today I tried the tropical storm tea and OMG. Delecious. So excited to have them as part of the community!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your support!
It makes us so happy that you enjoy your tea!

name: Jess C
text: The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. The teas are awesome!! I hope this company sticks around for a while.

resp.text:
Thank you so much!
We plan stay as long as we possibly can.
As long as we can continue to keep the support of this great community. 🐸
Anything we can do to improve please let us know.

name: Michelle B
text: Have loved each of the teas I have gotten! Staff is very friendly and I love having a healthier option available in Montgomery!!

resp.text: THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT! We are happy to be here to serve you.

name: Andrew Bloodworth
text: 😋 delicious!

name: Kristin Winsett
text: Amazing staff with amazing teas!!!

resp.text:
Thank you so much!
We are open to suggestions
To improve. 🐸

name: Marshall B
text: This is a wonderful, must visit shop.  If you want a little taste of Texas, the owners will serve you up a heaping helping. The customer service is second to none. Each customer is number one. If you have time to visit and the shop isn't too busy, take some time and visit with Robert. He's an awesome guy and truly knows how to bring a smile to your face and put a song in your heart.  You don't know what you're missing if you haven't been Nola Star. If you have been to Nola Star, quit keeping it a secret. Trust me when I say that there's enough of Robert to go around. Please go check it out and see what Nola Star is all about. Tell Robert that Marshall sent you. I don't think you'll get a discount, but he can probably whip up a good story for you while he makes your favorite concoction. You'll be glad you stopped by Nola Star.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. There’s definitely a story or two to be found in this noggin!!!

name: Lauren Thomas
text: Nola is my go-to for specialty tea's they are always perfect for me and the staff is super nice!

resp.text: Thank you Lauren, Nola Star has the best members! We think of y’all as family. See ya soon.

name: Courtney Miller
text: I’m not an expert on the teas, but the barista recommended the Fiji Falls and it was really good!!  First one I’ve gotten from a place that wasn’t all ice!  I was able to drink on it all day and it didn’t taste watered down after only drinking half of it. It also didn’t have that powdered taste because they were able to use more water to mix it. Definitely going back. Two thumbs up!!

name: Danie Richardson
text: Great drinks i recommend the Captain america or the Unicorn because they dont have a vitamin taste to them and they make you feel awesome!

name: Pam Ward
text: High dollar herbalife shakes. Not quite made right. Should be fluffy..not dense.

name: Ken Stall
text: Ive been coming here about a year now and they always have Great smoothies. Very clean and the owners are superrrrr nice! My favorite is the Amazon Kick. The flavors are amazing. Its a little pricey but I don't mind they usually give great coupons once a week. Keep up the good work!

name: Haley Drummond
text: The owners were so sweet to me and my husband while we waited on our Strawberry Colada and Java The Nut! Highly recommend those smoothies and this place!

name: Anna Gleason
text: They were so kind and welcoming to me (a new customer)! Lol. I appreciated all the help finding the perfect smoothie. Definitely coming back here!

name: Beau Green
text: Today I enjoyed a great smoothie from a friendly staff. I was in between a couple options and they asked me preferences then made some recommendations. The owner of the store talked with me and made me feel welcome. I highly recommend!

name: Katherine Chastain
text: The owner was in the store when I went in for a lunch smoothie. He was very kind and recommended a great add in for my smoothie. He offered everyone in the store a sample of another smoothie they were testing out. GREAT customer service.

name: Givon Wayne Gilliam
text: Super nice employees. Great smoothies. My favorite is Java The Nut.

name: Mariyah Elizabeth
text: Rude staff. Worker intentionally ignored me in line and skipped right over me to acknowledge a customer order who came in after me. I believe it was racially motivated.

name: Thomas Watts
text: Great smoothies will be going back regularly

name: Virginia A
text: Great smoothies and service, my fav smoothie place/chain.

name: isabel gutierrez
text: good

name: James “XDMAN” Nicholas
text:
Yard Birds Chicken Company keeps getting better and better. They changed the menu yesterday and added cheese grits and bottomless Chicken & waffles everyday! I love chicken and waffles, but the portion was big enough that I could only eat one waffle, crispy fried breast and wing. To the owner you are a man of your word when you said you would fix the problems. We have been back a 4th and 5th time and every thing was fantastic!

2nd visit maybe I just have bad luck, Stood at the door for several minutes with my wife. They were not busy and we even asked an employee if we could just sit. Someone will be with you. I want to like this place but....... a simple hey we see you would help. I would actually rate it lower but the fried chicken is good and that got them an extra star. 1st visit Ate lunch at Yard Birds Chicken Company. Today was the grand opening so I will forgive them for forgetting the jalapeño cornbread then giving me biscuits and having to ask for ranch multiple times. The chicken was excellent, They use a crumbly crust almost like you use on fried green tomatoes. And It almost seems like they smoke the chicken first then batter and fry. It was tasty and next time I will have to have the hot. Now for the bad the corn bread was cold, not just room temp but cold. If it was warm then man it would have been great. As a suggestion please please add a honey butter with the warm cornbread or biscuits and it would be perfection.

name: Chastity Webb
text: Went on a Tuesday around lunch. It wasn’t busy as there were only about 4 other tables. Waitress was nice but service was slow. Menu advertises steak fries, we received potato wedges. Not sure is that is a typo on the menu or a stock issue as their collard greens were also out of stock that day. Wouldn’t care to visit again.

name: Justin Williams
text: Went Friday night, the place had a nice crowd. Sat at the bar and ordered right away. Bartender was very nice and talkative. Food was great! Need to cook the potato wedges just a hair longer though. Will definitely be back to try the wings another day.

name: Nick Pearson
text: Best Chicken you can get in Trussville. I have eaten in twice and done Take-Out twice. Never had a bad experience and food always tastes amazing. The portions are huge and prices are just right! If you haven't tried it yet I suggest you do so!

name: Linsey Honeycutt
text: My husband and I went to Yard Birds today to try the "bottomless chicken and waffles " It was delicious! The service was great and The chicken was freshly fried and hot when delivered. He ordered the original waffle. I ordered the chocolate chip waffle. Huge portions! No way we could do seconds! We had get a to go box for our first round!! We also ordered a bourbon pecan pie to go. We have not tried it yet, but it's beautiful in its box and smells amazing! We will be back!!!

name: Katy Gibson
text: Stopped in for the weekend brunch of ENDLESS chicken n waffles ($10 each), So good! The staff was friendly and helpful. Try it you'll love it. Plus the restaurant donates a part of their profits to military and first responders.

name: Peggy Cox
text: We visited the new Yard Birds Chicken in Trussville last evening. Very nice experience. Very clean, very friendly and very good food. Prices are reasonable and service is excellent. A nice, relaxing dinner. Absolutely the best Mac and cheese I've ever had!

name: Joanna Nicholas
text: We decided to try this place again a few nights ago. I got the bourbon Sriracha popcorn chicken. It was amazing and there was more than enough for leftovers. I ate it again the next day and it was even better. We ate there again today & it was wonderful again. Service was nice and quick. I'm so glad this place worked out it's growing pains & had turned into a decent place to have lunch or dinner.

name: K Mixon
text: It was just okay.  I got the smoked chicken and it had no flavor.  The grits were extremely runny and the collard greens were not good.  The macaroni and cheese had an unique taste that my daughter did not like.  I would have given this place one star but the severs were so nice and extremely helpful.

name: Anthony Riley
text: The food was great, it deserves five stars. The service was ok, it did take a little while for our order but it wasn't too long. The only drawback for me were the prices which I thought were a little high. I will have to try here again in the near future, the food was worth the trip.

name: Mary Libb
text: Just had the best fried chicken, fried green tomatoes and homemade pimento cheese at Yardbirds. The atmosphere, servers and music were also great. Will definitely be back soon!!

name: Lauren Washington
text: First time here, service started out a little slow, but our server Alexis made up for that, she was very friendly and provided great service. I really would like to give this place 3.5 starts just because it's not quite 4. Chicken was fried well, and breast was juicy and not dry, the crust had great flavor but the meat itself didn't have much flavor, chicken should be marinated or brined to give the meat some flavor. Whole fried okra was very good. Macaroni cheese was soupy with hardly any cheese flavor, they should revamp that recipe, collard greens were like they had been sitting all day they were over cooked. My family liked the waffles. I would give it another try to try some of the other sides. I think with a few changes this place would be a go to place.

name: Halen Talley
text: Very good. I think this would be a good place to come on a Football Saturday.

name: Neal Morrow
text: Chicken was cold and tasteless. Mac and cheese was not good but did enjoy the fried green tomatoes. Also, they forgot the cornbread/buscuit.

name: Landon K
text: I had mac & cheese, fruit bowl, and 8 pc wings. It was all really good and the wings are really big.

name: Tonja Johnson
text: It was 15.00 for a small cup of Mac & Cheese, 4 small potatoe wedges and popcorn chicken. The popcorn chicken was mostly crumbs, all of the food was overcooked, and cold. Will not return

name: katie woodall
text: Great food and service!!!! We will be back for.  Chicken and waffles

name: Corey Morris
text: Came in the afternoon and no one here and still has taken them 20 + mins to bring my wings. They were no servers in sight when we entered it took at least 5 mins before they came out from the back

name: cporourke
text: Great food! Better service!

name: Neoami S
text: I did not like this place.  Chicken was done and tasted ok.  Sides (macaroni and potato salad) were the worst I've ever eaten. Cornbread was hard and horrible.  Will not be back.

name: Terrell Glass
text: Great chicken. It's a little expensive but it's worth it!

name: Felicia Shaw
text: Love the fact that we can make customized Juices and Smoothies to our customers liking and we can be creative with our smoothie Bowls we make.... Love being a part of a healthy establishment, and hey it’s an amazing option to choose on your way out from the gym from working out, instead of making an unhealthy choice

resp.text: Our customers are #1. Being able to “create their own” is definitely a plus. So many options to choose from. And not only do the kids have fun w it, but the adults do to.

name: Nicole Exum Creel
text: As an employee of this amazing establishment I am pleased to inform you that you will NEVER be disappointed. We will go the extra mile to make your visit one you will never forget. Our customers are our NUMBER 1 priority! We aim to give you the best customer service you can receive at any establishment you will visit. Our owner not only works right beside us but also will take time with EVERY customer to give you the best descriptions of any and all of our products. We provide you with the best options for healthy eating and healthy living. If you want to know more stop in and come see for yourself what we have to offer!

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We strive hard to make sure our customers are taken care of. We hope to see you again soon..

name: Varquita Whitehurst
text: The juice shack is amazing!!! Everything is always made fresh.  The staff is the sweetest & available to answer any questions & recommend items tailored to your goals.  They even created my own special juice for me.  This place has become part of my daily routine.  If you haven’t had a chance to try you definitely need to!

resp.text: It makes our heart happy to hear this. Our customers are like our family. We want y’all to feel right at home. Yes we can customize the orders to fit your likings/needs. Ty for your feedback. 🥰

name: Kendell Shows
text: I would go here every day if I could. Sweet employees, clean place & delish juice that I don’t have to make myself!

resp.text: Ty for your 5 star and great feedback. We are happy to be able to make your juices for you.

name: Brianna West
text: Wish I could give 5 stars because the smoothie was good, staff was very friendly and helpful,  place is very clean, ingredients seem fresh. But.. 9.70 for the small option with protein is way overpriced. I like to support local businesses but not willing to pay that everytime.

resp.text: Ty for your feedback and glad you enjoyed your smoothie and was taken care of. Yes we get a produce order just about every other day, sometimes every day. We do Not use concentrated liquids or canned goods. We have many options for base instead of just water. Other options; almond milk, oat milk, coconut milk, coconut water, etc and have many options for protein as well. We use Real fruits and veggies-it’s not broken down into a powder.Also, you can create your own or substitute any ingredients on the menu.  I’m sorry you feel that it’s costly, but it is costly to use Real ingredients. We do offer discounts to gym members (with proof of membership), military , and 1st responders. We also offer our loyalty reward program which is a big savings.. our customers are most important and we want to help keep the community healthy. It does cost money to be healthy but more to be sick. If you haven’t signed up for the loyalty reward program, I highly recommend. Ty and look forward to seeing you again.

name: Kimberly Giger
text:
Really great customer service.
And honestly just like I'd make a smoothie at home. I find most places make ultra sweet ones, and use more compotes than fresh fruit.
Nice, simple and healthy options.
And big ol' straws! Wish I could find something like this where I live.

resp.text: We appreciate the positive feedback and giving us a 5 star. Yes homemade smoothies and juices, no concentrated and very big straws-be careful not to get a brain freeze. Please stop in to see us again when your in town.

name: Kaska Howard
text: My new favorite place for healthy smooties/juices/bowls. Smoothies are made fresh without the extra sugar.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate that and you! See you soon.

name: Priscilla Horne
text: I love Juice Shack! I am so happy this place came to Dothan we needed a real juice and smoothie place here so bad. I wish I can give it 10 Stars! They have the best customer service there and everyone is always so polite. Super clean and also give discounts to the trainers who work at Crunch Fitness I am one of those trainers and instructors! From their smoothies, smoothie bowls, natural vegetableb & fruit juices, avocado toast, peanut butter, banana, & granola toast they are my favorites! Definitely stop by and see what juice Shack has in store for you their stuff is is amazing!

resp.text: Ty for the feedback! ❤️The positive comments always enjoy seeing you and your crew and yes we give discounts to our trainers and even to our gym members. And our loyalty program is also a plus.

name: J T
text: Had a fun experience at the Juice Shack yesterday with the kids. Staff was friendly and helpful and explained everything, was also very patient with the children and gave them free samples. Got enrolled in their frequent flyer program. They were very informative about the best way to order and all the hours that they were open and how to get in and out quickly in case we were on the way to work or on lunch. Couldn't ask for a friendlier staff, also got to meet the owner who is very personable and spent time talking to us on our first visit.

resp.text: Ty for the feedback. Yes we love our customers and the kiddos. So glad you guys enjoyed and can’t wait to see y’all soon.

name: Ashley Townsend
text: Im from about 50 miles away and I recently stopped by The Juice Shack and even brought a friend wanting to try the Boba options there. Upon no initial greeting when walking in, when it was our turn to order the lady looked down immediately at the register and stated “what can I get for you OH and we aren’t doing juices” With no offers of helpful alternatives we might would want to try the other worker shouts and flails her arms and states “we’ve already put it up”. So I ask the lady if I should come early to get a juice next time and she looks at me and said “yeah” turns around and walks off. I’m shook. Like why go out of your way to be rude to the people who support your small business?

resp.text: I’m just as upset as you are. I do apologize and will find out why they told you that. We close at 7, meaning the juicer isn’t broken down until 7. I appreciate y’all coming in and the feedback to let me know. Our customers are #1. I do apologize if anyone was rude. Please come back and ask for me, Mechau Mowbray or call the Juice Shack  and they’ll give you my contact. Again, I do apologize you had to travel a good distance and not get what you wanted.

name: Stephanie Richardson
text: The ladies there  are super friendly and helpful. I am looking forward to becoming one of their regular customers!!!

resp.text: Yes, we enjoy seeing and getting to know our regulars. So glad you were well taken care of. Ty

name: Margaret Carter
text: Incredible service, so so friendly staff. So helpful any kind!! Açaí bowl was delicious and very authentic taste, delicious! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Ty for sharing. Our customers are #1. Smoothie bowls are pretty amazing. You can’t go wrong with any of them.

name: Dioselin Cruz
text: Yum! Friendly staff and delicious smoothies. Great vegan options too.

resp.text: Ty for your feedback. We are happy you enjoyed it. Yes. Vegan options. We customize our drinks to each individual customers. Look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: b seigle
text: Very nice clean establishment friendly staff .

resp.text: Ty for your feedback and the 5 stars! We certainly appreciate you and hope to see you soon❤️

name: Matt L
text: Get selection very fresh

resp.text: Ty for your feedback, we do appreciate it. So glad you enjoyed. Yes we love the freshness. Look forward to seeing you soon.

name: Aerial Experts
text: After spending 9 years out is San Diego my wife and I certainly became very familiar with superfood stores and juice bars.  Once we arrived out here we were a little demoralized to find the lack of fun, healthy, locations out here.  Upon discovering this place my wife got us acai bowls and stowed them away in the freezer until I was able to make it home later that night.  Absolutely amazing and for anyone who has never experienced a REAL acai bowl this is as close to San Diego as you can get!  Very nice and friendly staff with a very clean and well maintained environment!

resp.text: We appreciate the feedback and excited we were able to meet your needs. We enjoy helping others get  🥕🍓healthy, so much fun. 😊

name: Jaimee Glover
text: A wonderFul  place to get a healthy snack or meal. Very friendly service.

resp.text: 🤗ty for your feedback. We enjoy making our customers happy.

name: Shannon Ganz
text: Friendly staff and my smoothie was delicious.

resp.text: Ty for the 5 stars. We appreciate your feedback and so happy you enjoyed your smoothie. Our customers are #1. We can’t wait to see you back. 😊

name: Ashley Simmons
text: I really LOVE the kale yea, customer service was friendly and helpful. I will most definitely be back.

resp.text: Kale yea! We are so excited you enjoyed it! Our customers are our #1! See you soon.

name: Max and mr.beast G m
text: As I was traveling through Dothan, I thought I would stop in and try this place! I wasn’t sure what to expect but I was blown away with how awesome this place is!  I love how everything is fresh and squeezed in front of you!  Definitely healthier than a smoothie and tastes delicious! It’s REAL fruit and FRESH!  No frozen fruits packed in high fructose corn syrups! I love this concept! Please come to Mobile! We need a Juice Shack!

resp.text: Ty for stopping by, glad you enjoyed it.

name: Ashley Brown
text: Best Açaí bowls ever!!! I get one every day!

resp.text: Awh. So glad you love! 🤗 ty for your feedback

name: Arlen Chapman
text: best juices and smoothies, healthy drinks, many options, friendly staff-always a joy.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star rating. We strive very hard to make our customers happy. We are so glad you are enjoying our juices and smoothies. We can’t wait to see you again soon!

name: nicole smith
text:
The only place in Dothan with boba! Though it is popping boba and not regular tapioca pearls, but I prefer the popping boba.
We got a green tea juice with honey and strawberry + kiwi boba, and a strawberry mango smoothie with strawberry + kiwi boba.
The drinks are super affordable and high in quality, and the boba has a strong flavor (can be rare to find that with popping boba.)
We will definitely become regulars here!

resp.text:
Ty for visiting. So glad it’s a new fav. We will start our loyalty cards soon. The popping boba are a lot of fun. We now offer mango flavor and cherry flavor otw.
We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Kaylee McElveen
text: Great fresh smoothies and wonderful service

resp.text: Ty for sharing. We certainly appreciate you! We can’t wait to see you soon.

name: Donnia Rambin
text: I highly recommend The Juice Shack!  100% real fruit and veggies, no preservatives and it taste sooo good.

resp.text: Ty. We are so glad you enjoy it. And yes fresh and delicious.

name: Brandi Shelley
text: My fav is the slim shady add bobo!!!!!! I’ve actually liked everything I’ve tried!!!! Very clean and staff is so amazing and friendly!!!!!

text: Food is pretty good, but I called in a to go order wasn't even prepared until I arrived.

So with less labor sometimes its overwhelming when mutiple orders come in. Hope you understand, and again we dont want anyone to wait.

name: Carrie Rollwagen
text:
Shindigs is incredible. I normally get a burger and truffle fries because they're so delicious, but I've also had other things on the menu, including salad, and everything I had showed a really good balance of flavors and was really unique. This is the kind of food that is where cravings come from -- I've been known to leave my desk during an incredibly busy day at work just because I saw Shindigs tweet their menu.

Shindigs is a food truck, but they do provide everything you'll need to enjoy your meal: napkins, flatware, drinks, and a picnic table. (You may want to scout out more seating if the table is full, of course.)

They also do a fantastic job at catering -- I've been known to sneak more than a couple mini grilled cheese sandwiches off of caterer trays when they weren't looking just to have one more bite. I'm not proud of this, but it's just that good.

name: Alex
text: While I didn't enjoy the meal I got from their food truck (I belive their cook just got a bit heavy handed with the salt), I did enjoy the quick and efficient customer service I got once I wrote a review to them. The company apologized and returned my money. I would definitely try it again. I believe the nachos would have been delicious had it not been for the extra saltiness.

resp.text:
Thank you, again, for your constructive criticism!!! We would LOVE to see you again soon!!!
-The Shindigs Crew

text: A small mom and pop shop is such a delight to visit. the food was good and the staff was so warm and helpful.

name: Dustin Meyers
text: My wife and I love this place. So far I've enjoyed everything I've gotten. My wife works at the hospital and loves to order a few meals a week, so she can have them on her night shifts. The food is healthy and has lots of flavor. The owners and the employees have been very nice to everyone that comes through the doors. The Buffalo Chicken Wrap and the Bang Bang Chicken are a few of the must tries they have to offer.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review and continuous support! We're so have that we can help you both maintain a healthy diet while living busy lives! We strive to provide nothing but the best!

name: Morgan Stettler
text:
I love every single healthy item on the menu. My favorites are the wraps and chicken salads.
Their healthy Mediterranean twist on potato salad is a must try!
The friendliest customer service! Works around food allergies and are extremely considerate. I felt very welcomed when I walked in the door.

name: Amanda Alexander
text: My husband went to get me a chicken salad sandwich and I kept calling and no one would pick up so he just went. The owner told him he has only doing catering because he was not hurting for money. Seriously. Extremely rude. He couldn't even give him a simple sandwich with pasta salad he already had made and they are very rude people I wish I could give them a 0 for terrible customer service

resp.text: Good Afternoon, unfortunately we had to close due to the threat of dangerous road conditions. This was explained to your husband. We already had a catering booked that had to get out that could not have been done in the morning. He continued to insist that we make the sandwich and pasta, that by the way we did not have the product already made. We make our Chicken Salad by scratch and do not have cans of chicken lying around. So no we are not hurting for money as to where we needed to stress ourselves and staff out to make your 1 Chicken Salad Sandwich (that we don’t even have the croissants for either) and Pasta Salad that the Pasta would’ve needed to have been cooked. We were closed, that does not reflect on the amazing customer service that we provide. Unfortunately we do not have the menu items for the restaurant prepared for today’s service since we were closed due to the threat of dangerous weather conditions. Also If we were open then we would’ve answered the phone. We always post on our Facebook page, as most businesses do, to communicate with our customers and we had already done that. Have a blessed day! Thanks!

text: This place is amazing!!  Best wrap I've had ever. Customer service was top notch, food was fresh and delicious and restraunt was very clean. Their health score is 💯. I will be going back regularly. Great job!!

text: This place was better than expected. I've been looking for a place that sells healthier options and I've finally found it. I had the kale-licious smoothie and the chicken pesto wrap. The wrap had flavor y'all! Plus you could tell the lettuce was fresh because I kept crunching on it. You can't say that about a lot of healthy food places. Also my smoothie had very little sugar, which I was very happy about. As a girl with a big appetite, I was surprised how the food filled me up. I highly recommend!

I found everything to taste good, but I won't be back because of this.

text: Excited to try something new, which caters to our vegetarian diet, we set our GPS to take us straight to Kale Me Crazy. The hours on Sunday are 9am - 6pm, so with it being 10:30, we were certain we were in for a treat. Disappointingly, they were closed with no signage on the door to indicate why. So glad we drove 20 minutes to find closed doors! This is a poor way to conduct business and several consumers were disappointed upon our arrival.

text: This place has a place my heart because it is run like a local business by local.people who truly care and believe in their brand.  I am always impressed and am treated as if it were like home everytime

name: Cheryl Martin
text:
On my first visit, I ordered a smoothie without an ingredient I’m allergic to, but it was accidentally added. Luckily the staff realized before I drank the whole thing, and I was able to minimize my reaction in time. The owner was made aware, and after we spoke he offered for me to come meet him, and enjoy my second experience on the house. He expressed his concern for the mistake, and was clear on his intentions from keeping it from happening again. He is very enthusiastic about his business, and sharing how good nutrition can enrich your life.
Everything I’ve had from this restaurant has been delicious. Even the juices are mixed so well that I’m sure anyone can find at least one they like. They make eating healthy fun with wonderful staff and nice atmosphere, as well as making highly nutritious foods that taste great. My current line up of favorites are the wheatgrass shot, kale yeah juice, and the quinoa bowl. They offer so much more than just kale. Give it a try and support your local business as well as your health and taste buds!

After waiting about 5 minutes, I told her I would come back, walked over to Starbucks and purchased additional gift cards in less that 1 minute total.
Walked back to Smoothie, where 2 employees were now busy making smoothies. The other employee had never done a gift card either, but after waiting another 5 minutes (I was the only customer in the store both times, besides drive thru) I left without being spoken to. Good luck being open 6 months, and I hope you are because Athens needs places such as this. I have bought smoothies there before which I was very pleased with, although a little pricey.

What i don't like is their app. It doesn't always function when you went delivery but recent with all the fees for delivery, it's no reason to order. The fees alone are so high it's like you ordering the same thing again. I order a smoothie that's 11$ but the fees also equal that much, so to me it's like I'm missing out on a smoothie so it's pointless to use until they figure out a better approach.

name: Jessica Lewis (Jess)
text: A very large menu with all assortments and addons! They are featuring a tart cherry flavor add-in right now. I wanted to try Banana Boat because it sounded absolutely divine but alas, they were out of the frozen yogurt used to make it so I settled for a Caribbean Way, which consists of strawberries and bananas blended with a nonfat yogurt. It was actually really good. They offer 3 sizes for their smoothies. Lots of Smoothie King merch for sale, as well as various "health" chips and snacks. I would have given 5 stars except for their being out of stock of  a main ingredient for items on their menu. The young man that was the cashier was very knowledgeable and helpful, polite.

resp.text: We appreciate the 4-star review and your feedback about our Caribbean Way smoothie, Jessica! We look forward to serving you again and making it 5 stars. 🥤

name: Kay Woods
text: The base of the fruit bowls are way too bland. It taste like water with no flavor. It has me questioning there food integrity. Do they use real fruit ? I suggest Juice Bar

resp.text: Hey Kay, I am so sorry your meal was disappointing. We have amazing employees and they make fresh bases daily using only real fruit. We add no artificial juices or sweeteners, because we believe fresh fruit is tasty all on its own. We also make the bases up front if you ever want to see our process in action. And thank you for mentioning The Juice Bar, we also love them. We are proud to support our fellow businesses here in Auburn and especially locally owned restaurants who share our mission of serving the Auburn community fresh, heart healthy fruit. Thanks for the feedback and thank you for dropping by.

text: Super friendly staff! Awesome location - free parking in the West  & Wright parking deck is so convenient. I had one of their smoothies and and it was super yummy and fresh!! No other smoothie place compares!

resp.text: Thank you Levi! You rock!

text: Super nummy bowels with all kinds of good for you things in it. Process are reasonable and great to go for some good, sweet and good for you bowls of tasty

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Keith Milligan
text: Always love Frutta Bowls, but seriously, it’s football game day and Frutta Bowl is closed and it’s still an hour and a half until game time. It may be a good time to examine special hours on game days and take advantage of the extra crowd. I just witnessed three more people go up to the door and try to pull it open while I was typing this. Regardless, I’ll try again next time. It’s really good.

resp.text:
Hey Keith. So sorry for the inconvenience. One of our biggest challenges has been figuring out hours that work on game day. Today, from 4:00 until you tried to come in, we literally had only one customer.
Please have a bowl on us next time you come in. Show this message at the register. We really appreciate your business and feedback.

resp.text: Thanks Caroline! So glad you love us! Have you tried our combo pick 2 deal? You get two items for $11. Hopefully that might help with the price point and you get more food. :)

text: I think Frutta bowls is the best place in AL for Acai. Their granola & fruit toppings are great. Something about the acai base is kinda off. It doesn’t stay frozen as long as it should.

resp.text: Thanks for coming to see us. Our açaí base is only the açaí berry mixed with bananas. Our base recipe is supposed to be smooth/creamy. You might could try putting your bowl in the freezer at home for a little while if you like it frozen. Again, thanks for trying us!

name: Kristen Bowman
text: I love smoothie king in Foley! They are so awesome and friendly and make the best smoothies

resp.text: Kristen, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review! We are thrilled that you loved your experience; our team members will definitely be happy to read what you wrote. See you again soon!

name: HunterJace E
text: This establishment is very clean and well kept. When I made my visit Zabree and her sister Caidence were working. They were extremely friendly with great customer service skills. They are exactly who the face of this smoothie king should be. The smoothies are excellent! Thank you for the great service!

name: Brandon Jasinski
text: I come to this location often, and I always order the same thing. This time however my smoothie tasted like watered down powder. I called the store and tried to explain that I always get the same thing and this one wasn’t right to which the girl replied “I made it myself that’s how it’s supposed to taste but I’ll remake it”. Look if you’re telling me it’s how it’s supposed to taste, I really don’t want you to make me another one. I hate that I had to throw it down the drain because they are on the expensive side. At least we are getting a soul bowl here soon.

name: Charlie Hunnam
text: Sad that employees can’t even follow the rules and cover their face, won’t be returning here👎👎

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing this with us, Charlie. The safety of our team members and guests is our top priority, and we will address this concern ASAP. If you want to share further details, please contact us here referencing your review: guestfeedback@smoothieking.com

text: This is a 10/10 recommendation from me. I knew this would be a busy place but I never expected the amount of kindness I received from the employees. Not even to mention that their smoothies are to die for. such great quality and taste. Great for a hot day

name: Jena Hand
text: I’ve been with this store since day one. Me and my coworkers love working here. The owner, Starr is so passionate about this business and she treats our customers and her staff like family. I’m so happy to be a part of such a great team and serving such a great city some awesome smoothies!

text: Such an amazing staff. The quality of everything is A1 (which means it's top notch, if some of you didn't know). Smoothie King is an all time favorite and I'm happy to have one in my town!

name: Eva West
text: I normal don’t write reviews but since I moved down here from California and they just opened a smoothie king.. I decided I needed to share a great experience. On my way to work I was stuck in traffic and decided I wanted something cold and healthy. I stop  by smoothie king and ordered the Mango Fest.. 10/10 would recommend this to everyone,  it was SO good.. but besides how good my smoothie was, the staff was super friendly and super fast as well. They were pretty busy that day but everyone still had smiles on their faces and greeted everyone who walked through the door. This smoothie king is a wonderful place, and this is the only place I’ll go for my smoothies!!

We will address this with our team in order to find a way to improve for your next visit. If you want to share more details, please email us here: guestfeedback@smoothieking.com

Where's the customer service? Where im from i frequent smoothie king 3-5 times a week and I was excited that a location was built down the road from where I'm now living. After that experience I guess I'll just have to buy a blender and make my own smoothies cause I'm not about to waste my time like that ever again. Oh, of course all the kids working there were more worried about gossip than making my smoothie from what I noticed. Lots of ppl back there talking but not about work.
